column1: Kata Robata////We ended with the Chef's Sashimi for two. It was pretty good
column2: and had a large amount of sushi on there. So much that I actually found myself wanting to be done with it by the end... I needed a new taste in my mouth
column3: haha. If I did it again
column4: I would have ordered separate nigiri/sashimi items off the menu and gotten a roll to break up the taste of the sashimi.
